name: ticketbooking app
description: A ticket booking app is a software application designed to streamline the process of purchasing tickets for various events, transportation, and activities.

name: hotelbooking app
description: A hotel booking system is a software application or platform that allows users to search for, compare, and reserve accommodations at various hotels, resorts, and other lodging establishments

name: subscription app
description: Stripe Subscriptions is a powerful and flexible platform offered by Stripe that allows businesses to easily create and manage recurring billing for their products and services.

name: delivery app
description: A delivery app is a software application designed to facilitate the transportation of goods or services from a point of origin to a designated destination.

name: social app
description: A social app is a mobile or web-based application designed to facilitate communication, connection, sharing, and interaction among users.

name: leet code
description: LeetCode is a comprehensive platform for practicing and mastering algorithms and data structures, particularly valuable for software engineers looking to improve their coding skills and prepare for technical interviews.

name: blog app
description: A React blog application provides a dynamic,user-friendly, and often performant platform for content sharing.
